global String Status__c

Field Attributes

Data Type:Text
Formula:IF( (PendingAmount__c <= 0), "Paid", IF( OR((PendingAmount__c == InvoicesAmount__c), (PendingAmount__c == BillsRevenue__c)), "Pending", IF( (PendingAmount__c > 0), "Partially Paid", "Error" ) ) )
